result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

no intentional contact with minors, no internet for social media that allows for social networking, no downloading images or sharing of images of any kind where minors are involved.

01:36 PM Defendant Aaron Michael Peterson in court with attorney Ellen Denise Craker for special appearance.  Defendant Aaron Michael Peterson in custody.  Chad C La Lor appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Aaron Michael Peterson appeared by video means with Attorney.   Attorney/defendant acknowledges receipt of criminal complaint, waives reading and requests Prelim Hearing. Defendant does not qualify.   States request on bail: $10,000 cash with conditions of no contact with minors, no social media, no use of internet unless contact with counsel. 
Atty Craker asserts she didn't see any major criminal history in Minnesota. Defendant has significant ties to Superior. Defendant does have employment. Atty Craker argues State's request on bail. 
Court Orders $10,000 cash bail with conditions of  no intentional contact with minors, no internet for social media that allows for social networking, no downloading images or sharing of images of any kind where minors are involved. Court will send Text Message Reminder Slip to the Jail.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Status conference scheduled for February 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
1318 Cummings Ave, Aaron Peterson, any and all people, and any and all vehicles located at the property.
